text: Hianagi Tebesi rankumara ha' vahe'mo'za eme ha' hunte'za eri haviza nehu'za vahera zamavare'za kuma zamirega kina ome huzmante'naze. Ne'onse mofavre naga zaminena zamazerite'za maka kumamofo kantu hanafi ruragati'za zamahe'naze. Sondia vahe'mo'za satu zokago re'za nege'za, Isipi kamanimofo eri'za vahera refko hu'za eri'za vahe'zami zamare'naze. Ana nehu'za Tebesi rankuma'ma kvama hu'naza kva vahetamina seni nofiteti kina huzmante'naze.
